title: Serviceable Passenger Locomotives for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1921-1937 (2)--Original Data, 1937-1943 Data Include Switching And Terminal Companies. Data Are Midmonth Figures Computed From End-Of-Month Data. Source: Interstate Commerce Commission, Motive Power And Car Equipment Of Class I Steam Railways In The U.S.

This NBER data series m01258b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01258b
